ProjectTitle: Multifunctional smart-releasing mesoporous materials for dental implant applications
InitialFeedbackHistory:
15/05/2024
Data: Will you use materials/samples? Please list these in the tabel as well, they are considered physical data in the context of a DMP
Sharing: when you share data under restricted access you can't add a licence but need a Data Transfer Agreement that the RDR team will write with you; you can share the data directly via RDR, but if you need to share other files belnet filesender is a more secure option than freeware: https://filesender.belnet.be/
label: good with suggestions
